name: Absorbing Man
effect: May play "Molecular Mimic" from Reserve.

name: Absorbing Man - Absorb Properties
effect:
This Special acts identical to any Hit in Absorbing Man's Hits from the Current Battle or Permanent Record.
One per deck.

name: Absorbing Man - Crusher Creel
effect: Acts as a level 5 Fighting attack. If successful, Target Character -2 to defense for remainder of battle.

name: Absorbing Man - Molecular Mimic
effect: Play with any Basic Universe card. Absorbing Man's Power Grid gets Bonus in that Power Type for remainder of game.

name: Absorbing Man - Rebuild Form
effect:
Discard 1 Power card usable by Absorbing Man to remove all Hits with same icon from Absorbing Man's Permanent Record. May not discard a MultiPower card.
One per deck.

name: Absorbing Man - Titania
effect: Opponent -3 to Venture Total for this battle. If opponent has "The Secret Wars" Mission, opponent -6 to Venture Total for this battle.

name: Absorbing Man - Wrecking Ball
effect: Acts as a level 5 Strength attack. May not be defended with a Special card.

name: Adam Warlock - The Infinity Watch
effect: Avoid 1 Energy or Intellect attack.

name: Adamantium Tentacles
effect:
Teammate's Strength Rating increases to 7 for remainder of game.
One per deck.

name: Age of Apocalypse
effect:
Chars: Morph, Shadowcat, Holocaust, Dark Beast, Blink, X-Man

Ability: Age of Apocalypse Team +2 to Venture Total per battle if using "Age of Apocalypse" Mission with at least 1 Event card.

name: Alpha Flight - Murmur
effect:
All Energy Power card Hits on Target Character are doubled when determining Cumulative K.O. for remainder of game. Does not count toward Venture Total.
One per deck.

name: Any Character - New Universe
effect:
Play to concede battle. All Mission cards Ventured this battle return to piles Ventured from. May be Placed. Counts as a duplicate of all "Any Hero/Character" EN Specials.
One per deck.

name: Any Mission - To Save the World
effect: For remainder of Battle, after Venturing, if one player either draws or discards cards, Placed or in Hand, then other player must draw or discard an equal number of cards, either Placed or in Hand.

Daily Bugle: To Save the World

After defeating The Overmind, The Squadron Supreme, as a show of faith appeared unmasked to launch their Utopia Program, designed to the ills of mankind.

name: Baron Mordo - Bargain Lifeforce
effect: Baron Mordo's Hits to K.O. is reduced by 7 points. Baron Mordo's Energy and Intellect Power Grid Ratings increase to 8 for the remainder of game.

name: Baron Mordo - Demonic Summons
effect:
Acts as a level 8 Strength, Fighting, or Intellect attack.
One per deck.

name: Baron Mordo - Illusion Casting
effect: Avoid 1 attack.

name: Baron Mordo - Jealous Disciple
effect: Acts as a level 3 Intellect attack, +1 for each Mission card in Baron Mordo's Defeated Missions Pile.

name: Baron Mordo - Mystical Menace
effect: Negates the effect of any 1 Special card played by opponent against Baron Mordo only.

name: Baron Mordo - Spell of Silence
effect: Acts as a level 5 Energy attack. May not be affected by a card with the word "teammate" on it.

name: Beta Ray Bill
effect: May play any "Thor" Special cards.

name: Black Panther - African Monarch
effect: Play this Special card with any other Special card from Hand. Value of Special card is added to Black Panther's Venture Total for this battle.

effect: Avoid 1 attack.

effect:
Acts as a level 4 Energy or Strength attack. May combine with 1 Intellect card for a single attack.

effect: Remove 1 Hit from Black Panther's Permanent Record, and Black Panther's Fighting Rating increases to 8 for remainder of Battle.

effect: Acts as a level 5 Fighting attack. May not be defended with a Special card.

name: Black Panther - Wakandan Technology
effect: Black Panther's Battlesite's Hits to K.O. number is increased by 5 points for remainder of game.

effect: Acts as a level 5 Intellect attack. If successful, Target Character -2 to defense for remainder of battle.

effect: Acts as a level 4 Fighting attack. If Target Character is K.O.'d by this Hit, Bullseye may move 1 Mission card from the Defeated Pile to the Completed Pile.

effect: Acts as a level 4 Energy, Fighting, Strength, or Intellect attack. May be used against Character in Reserve, who may defend.

name: Bullseye - Relentless Assault
effect: Acts as a level 7 Fighting attack. If successful, acts as a level 3 Strength Hit. Hit goes on Target Character's Permanent Record. Does not count toward Venture Total.

effect: Energy Power Grid Rating is 8 for defense.

effect: Acts as a level 5 Fighting attack. If successful, Target Character -2 to defense for remainder of battle.

name: Thunderbolts - M.A.C.H.1
effect: Acts as a level 5 Fighting attack. If successful, Target Character -2 to defense for remainder of battle.

name: Thunderbolts - Meteorite
effect:
Draw 2 cards from top of Thunderbolts' Draw Pile. Put 1 card on bottom of Draw Pile. Put 1 card in Hand. May be duplicate.
One per deck.

name: Thunderbolts - Songbird
effect: Play with any Power card usable by Thunderbolts. Thunderbolts may not be attacked by a Power card of equal or lesser value for remainder of battle.

name: Thunderbolts - Techno
effect: Acts as a level 4 Intellect attack. May combine with 1 Fighting card for a single attack.

name: Wakanda
effect:
Chars: Black Panther, Doctor Doom, Vision, Hawkeye, Storm, Klaw

Ability: Wakanda Team's MultiPower Power cards are -1 to attack.

name: White Queen - Corporate Cutthroat
effect: Acts as a level 3 Intellect attack. May make 1 additional Power card attack. Neither attack may be defended with a Special card.

name: X-Babies - Li'l Iceman
effect: Opponent must immediately discard all Special cards in play that affect "the remainder of the battle" or "the remainder of the Game.".
